page.title: 17A Welsh International.
page.content: Ann Ellis was a hockey player with Gowerton School,Swansea,Wales and Great Britain.She used to play in the position of sweeper and helped to defend the goal.She has represented Wales 136 times in the years between 1963-1980. Five years ago she retired from international hockey and took up the post of Welsh Team Coach.Miss Ellis has travelled all over the world playing hockey, she collects a silver spoon as a momento from each place she visits. In 1985 it was Ann Ellis who was in charge of the Welsh Ladies hockey team that played in a tournament in Argentina.This was a very special trip because it was the first time a British team had played in Argentina since the Falklands War between the two countries in 1982.
